name: Tumblr Hide '#tags' Prompt
description: When you write a post, "#tags" shows where tags go. This style fixes most inconsistencies.

user.name: Mike Gebirge
user.about: I'm just some tumblr user that is annoyed by tumblr's shortcomings that even I can fix in a few minutes. So here they are, a few of them. For updates, follow http://kedaiyis-fixes.tumblr.com/

additional_info:
When you write a post, there's a line at the bottom where you can enter your tags. Tumblr marks it with a helpful "#tags".

However, it's displayed in a slightly wrong color in a slightly wrong position and it's sometimes there even after you wrote your tag! That's annoying for me, and probably quite nerve-wracking for OCD people.

This userstyle should fix all those problems by:
- correcting the color
- making sure the "#tags" hint disappears whenever there's an actual tag

In the screenshot(s) you can see:
- top: Original, with tag "#tags" and the "#tags" prompt side-by-side. As you can see: It's not aligned and different colors. Horrible! And the prompt probably shouldn't be there anyway.
- bottom left: With my style, before entering a new tag
- bottom right: With my style, after (not while) entering a tag.
